title: New: Azealia Banks – Aquababe (Produced by Machinedrum)
body:
A rare known fact about **Azealia Banks** is that when she isn’t blocking people on Twitter or throwing hissy fits that involve sacking her management, she also makes music.

Weird, huh? Here’s another new cut from Miss **Banks**, again with production from **Machinedrum**, and it’s marginally better than her previous attempts, despite it’s crass language and the lyrical complexity of a three year old. As with many of her other tracks, I can’t help feeling that the beat on _Aquababe_ deserves a better MC….
